zh-cn: 真天命太平天国天朝九门御林云师前导副军师殿后军南王七千岁

description.zh-cn: 太平天国南王，拜上帝会的始创人之一，洪秀全最早的支持者。他制定了太平天国初期的官制、礼制和军制，在太平天国的发展中起到关键作用，被认为是太平天国的第一智囊。1852年在全州蓑衣渡被清军炮火击中身亡。
description.en: South King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, one of the founders of the God Worshipping Society, and the earliest supporter of Hong Xiuquan. He formulated the early official system, ritual system, and military system of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, playing a key role in its development and is considered its foremost strategist. He was killed by Qing army cannon fire at Suoyi Ferry, Quanzhou in 1852.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国天王，与冯云山是同乡，共同创立了拜上帝会和太平天国。
description.en: The Heavenly King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, a fellow townsman of Feng Yunshan, with whom he co-founded the God Worshipping Society and the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 由洪秀全、冯云山等人于19世纪中叶在中国建立的农民起义政权。
description.en: A peasant rebel state in China established in the mid-19th century by individuals including Hong Xiuquan and Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国运动前的秘密宗教组织，由洪秀全和冯云山于1843年创立。
description.en: A secret religious organization that preceded the Taiping Rebellion, founded by Hong Xiuquan and Feng Yunshan in 1843.

description.zh-cn: 清朝将领，其部队在蓑衣渡伏击并用炮火击中冯云山，致其身亡。
description.en: A Qing dynasty general whose troops ambushed and struck Feng Yunshan with cannon fire at Suoyi Ferry, causing his death.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山和洪秀全的出生地，位于清朝广东省，现属广州市花都区。
description.en: The birthplace of Feng Yunshan and Hong Xiuquan, located in Guangdong Province during the Qing Dynasty, now part of Huadu District, Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山的逝世地点，位于广西。
description.en: The place of Feng Yunshan's death, located in Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山之父。
description.en: Father of Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山之母。
description.en: Mother of Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 西方传教士，在香港创立了福汉会。
description.en: A Western missionary who founded the Chinese Union in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 由西方传教士郭士立在香港创立的基督教会组织。
description.en: A Christian organization founded in Hong Kong by the Western missionary Karl Gützlaff.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国东王，原为烧炭工，由冯云山发展加入拜上帝会并提拔。
description.en: East King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, originally a charcoal burner, who was recruited into the God Worshipping Society and promoted by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国西王，由冯云山发展加入拜上帝会并提拔。
description.en: West King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, who was recruited into the God Worshipping Society and promoted by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国燕王，原为矿工，由冯云山发展加入拜上帝会。
description.en: Yan King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, originally a miner, who was recruited into the God Worshipping Society by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国北王，由冯云山引入并提拔。
description.en: North King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, who was introduced and promoted by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国翼王，由冯云山引入并提拔。
description.en: Yi King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, who was introduced and promoted by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国豫王，由冯云山引入并提拔。
description.en: Yu King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, who was introduced and promoted by Feng Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 标志着太平天国运动开始的武装起义。
description.en: The armed uprising that marked the beginning of the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 由谢介鹤撰写的记载太平天国历史的文献，其中称冯云山为“奇才”。
description.en: A historical document about the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom written by Xie Jiehe, in which Feng Yunshan is described as an 'extraordinary talent'.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国忠王李秀成的自述，其中高度评价了冯云山在创立太平天国过程中的谋略与贡献。
description.en: The autobiography of Li Xiucheng, the Loyal King of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, which highly praises Feng Yunshan's strategy and contributions in the founding of the kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山与洪秀全是同乡，是洪秀全最早的支持者，两人共同创立了拜上帝会和太平天国。
description.en: Feng Yunshan and Hong Xiuquan were from the same hometown. Feng was Hong's earliest supporter, and they co-founded the God Worshipping Society and the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山是拜上帝会的始创人之一，与洪秀全共同创立该组织。
description.en: Feng Yunshan was one of the founders of the God Worshipping Society, co-founding the organization with Hong Xiuquan.

description.zh-cn: 1843年，洪秀全在花县创立拜上帝会。
description.en: In 1843, Hong Xiuquan founded the God Worshipping Society in Huaxian.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山与洪秀全共同创立太平天国，并制定了其初期的官制、礼制和军制。
description.en: Feng Yunshan co-founded the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom with Hong Xiuquan and established its initial official, ritual, and military systems.

description.zh-cn: 1851年金田起义后，洪秀全封冯云山为南王、前导副军师、后军主将。
description.en: After the Jintian Uprising in 1851, Hong Xiuquan enfeoffed Feng Yunshan as the South King, Vice-General of the Vanguard, and Commander of the Rearguard.

description.zh-cn: 1852年6月，江忠源率领的清军在全州蓑衣渡伏击太平军，其炮火命中冯云山，致其伤重身亡。
description.en: In June 1852, Qing forces led by Jiang Zhongyuan ambushed the Taiping army at Suoyi Ferry in Quanzhou. Their cannon fire struck Feng Yunshan, leading to his death from severe injuries.

description.zh-cn: 有记载称冯云山曾加入由传教士郭士立在香港创立的福汉会。
description.en: It is recorded that Feng Yunshan once joined the Chinese Union, an organization founded by missionary Karl Gützlaff in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 在香港创立了基督教会组织福汉会。
description.en: Founded the Christian organization, the Chinese Union, in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山在广西传教期间，发展烧炭工杨秀清加入拜上帝会，并提拔他成为核心领导之一。
description.en: During his missionary work in Guangxi, Feng Yunshan recruited charcoal burner Yang Xiuqing into the God Worshipping Society and promoted him to be one of the core leaders.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山在广西传教期间，发展萧朝贵加入拜上帝会，并提拔他成为核心领导之一。
description.en: During his missionary work in Guangxi, Feng Yunshan recruited Xiao Chaogui into the God Worshipping Society and promoted him to be one of the core leaders.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山在广西传教期间，发展矿工秦日纲加入拜上帝会。
description.en: During his missionary work in Guangxi, Feng Yunshan recruited miner Qin Rigang into the God Worshipping Society.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山一手引入并提拔韦昌辉成为太平天国核心领导之一。
description.en: Feng Yunshan single-handedly introduced and promoted Wei Changhui to become one of the core leaders of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山一手引入并提拔石达开成为太平天国核心领导之一。
description.en: Feng Yunshan single-handedly introduced and promoted Shi Dakai to become one of the core leaders of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 冯云山一手引入并提拔胡以晃成为太平天国核心领导之一。
description.en: Feng Yunshan single-handedly introduced and promoted Hu Yihuang to become one of the core leaders of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 拜上帝会组织并领导了金田起义，宣告太平天国的建立。
description.en: The God Worshipping Society organized and led the Jintian Uprising, proclaiming the establishment of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 《金陵甲癸纪事略》中曾称冯云山为“奇才”，并记录了他的功劳。
description.en: The 'Jinling Jiagui Jishilüe' referred to Feng Yunshan as an 'extraordinary talent' and recorded his contributions.

description.zh-cn: 《李秀成自述》中提到：“谋立创国者出南王之谋，前做事者皆南王也。”，高度评价了冯云山的贡献。
description.en: In 'Li Xiucheng's Autograph', it is mentioned: 'The strategies for establishing the kingdom came from the South King; all the early work was done by the South King,' highly praising Feng Yunshan's contributions.
